title: Button Grow Animation
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a button with a grow animation on hover using CSS. This effect can be used to add interactivity and visual interest to a website or application. By applying the transform property and :hover pseudo-class, we can make the button scale up when the user hovers over it, creating a subtle but effective animation.

meta.title: Create a Captivating Button Grow Animation with CSS
meta.description: Learn how to add a smooth and visually appealing grow animation to your website buttons using CSS.
meta.keywords: css, web design, css practice, user experience, button animation, css animation, css playground, hover effect, css lab, css exercises
